item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Just change:

                                                                            if(option == 0) {

                                                                                            owner.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "Although Zamorak's intentions are negative, I see your mind has been made.", owner));


                                                                                            owner.teleport(555, 555, false);
                                                                                            owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("@pnk@[event] You arrive in Silva.");
                                                                                            owner.setGod("Saradomin");
                                                                                            world.setFavorPoints(owner.getGod(), 1);
                                                                                            npc.unblock();
                                                                            }

To:

[code]
if(option == 0) {

                                                                                        owner.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "Although Zamorak's intentions are negative, I see your mind has been made.", owner));


                                                                                        owner.teleport(555, 555, false);
                                                                                        owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("@pnk@[event] You arrive in Silva.");
                                                                                        owner.setGod("Zamorak");
                                                                                        world.setFavorPoints(owner.getGod(), 1);
                                                                                        npc.unblock();
                                                                        }[/code]

item.title: [Release] God System / Kill Counting / Title Achievements / Universal Exp Mult
item.dc:creator: @xx_c1ph3r_xx xx c1ph3r xx
item.description:
@xx_c1ph3r_xx wrote:

There is even more yet, I am just sifting through my old code gathering it all.

org.rscdaemon.npchandler.Guthix.java - NPC to pick side
Yeh… make this file, then inside handleNpc void.

        player.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "Hello, " + player.getUsername() + ".  I figured our paths would soon cross.", player));
      		world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(player) {
                    public void action() {
                        owner.setBusy(false);
                        owner.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "The balance of the world has been disrupted.", owner));
                        world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
                            public void action() {
                                owner.setBusy(false);
                                owner.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "Zamorak and Saradomin are competing for the world's favor.", owner));
                                world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
                                public void action() {
                                    owner.setBusy(false);
                                    owner.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "You must choose a side before I can let you leave the Eden of Balance.", owner));
                                    
                                    world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
                                    public void action() {
                                            owner.setBusy(false);
                                            String[] options = new String[]{"I will follow the unholy Zamorak until I am damned.", "Saradomin will lead me to divinity."};
                                            owner.setMenuHandler(new MenuHandler(options) {
                                                    public void handleReply(final int option, final String reply) {
                                                            if(owner.isBusy()) {
                                                                    return;
                                                            }
                                                            owner.informOfChatMessage(new ChatMessage(owner, reply, npc));
                                                            owner.setBusy(true);
                                                            world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
                                                                    public void action() {
                                                                            owner.setBusy(false);
                                                                            if(option == 0) {

                                                                                            owner.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "Although Zamorak's intentions are negative, I see your mind has been made.", owner));


                                                                                            owner.teleport(555, 555, false);
                                                                                            owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("@pnk@[event] You arrive in Silva.");
                                                                                            owner.setGod("Zamorak");
                                                                                            world.setFavorPoints(owner.getGod(), 1);
                                                                                            npc.unblock();
                                                                            }
                                                                            if(option == 1) {

                                                                                            owner.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "The light of Saradomin will lead you to inner peace.", owner));

                                                                                            owner.teleport(555, 555, false);
                                                                                            owner.setGod("Saradomin");
                                                                                            world.setFavorPoints(owner.getGod(), 1);
                                                                                            owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("@pnk@[event] You arrive in Silva.");
                                                                                            npc.unblock();
                                                                            }
                                                                            else {
                                                                                    npc.unblock();
                                                                            }
                                                                    }
                                                            });
                                                    }				
                                            });
                                            owner.getActionSender().sendMenu(options);

                                    }
                            });

                                    }
                                });
                            }
                        });
                    }
                });
               
                
                player.setBusy(true);
      		
      		npc.blockedBy(player);
	}

@Kryptix
Yeah, I am fully aware it is unnecessary, but it doesn’t ever create conflict. Who knows how high it would go.

reserved.

Read full topic
item.source: [Release] God System / Kill Counting / Title Achievements / Universal Exp Mult

item.title: [Release] God System / Kill Counting / Title Achievements / Universal Exp Mult
item.dc:creator: @xx_c1ph3r_xx xx c1ph3r xx
item.description:
@xx_c1ph3r_xx wrote:

[size=18pt]God System / Kill Counting / Title Achievements[/size] [RSCDv25 Designed]
[size=14pt]Allows players to select either Zamorak or Saradomin to be their god of choice. [/size]
[size=13pt]Can set certain actions to earn the player 1 point of favor for their god. (Eg. Kill a servant of the opposite god in wilderness)[/size]
[size=12pt]Team with the most favor gets a bonus maybe, but the more points you earn for your god, the higher achievement title you earn.[/size]
[hr]
[size=14pt]This system should be broken down into a list…[/size]

[ul][li][size=12pt]Spawn In a secluded locked area, talk to NPC “Guthix” to leave.[/size][list]
[li]Default database god is, “Undecided”, People can’t leave this area, or put guthix where people can optionally pick a god.[/li]
[li]Player selects a god to be teleported to main city, God / God Kills will save to database normally. God will be the god selected here. “Zamorak”, or “Saradomin”[/li]
[/list][/li]
[li][size=12pt]Set your own ways to earn god points.[/size][list]
[li]Kill a worshipper of opposite god in wildy…[/li]
[/list][/li]
[li][size=12pt]Achivement / Title System[/size][list]
[li]Have achivement name appear in brackets before username when speaking.[/li]
[/list][/li]
[li][size=12pt]God point benefits[/size][list]
[li]followers of the god with more points gets 2x more exp…[/li]
[/list][/li]
[li][size=12pt]Universal Exp Variable[/size][list]
[li]establishes an exp multiplier base for the server, with a quickset command for admins, ::exprate value, and players can view personal rate with ::myrate[/li]
[/list][/li][/ul]

org.rscdaemon.server.util.Config.java - Universal Exp Multiplier
in… public static void initConfig(String file) throws IOException {

                EXP_MULT = 15; // The server default exp multplier rate.

where you see: public static int SERVER_PORT
add

, EXP_MULT

org.rscdaemon.server.model.Player.java - Part of Kill system / Title System / God System / Universal Exp Multiplier
Near top with other variable declarations…

   private int godkills = 0;
        private String god = "Zamorak";

In there near the one functions…

   public String getGod() {
      return god;
   }
   public int getGodKills() {
      return godkills;
   }

        public void addGodKills(int i) {
            godkills = godkills + i;
        }
        public void setGod(String s) {
            god = s;
        }
        public void setGodKills(int i) {
            godkills = i;
        }
   public String getTitle() {
                if(god.equalsIgnoreCase("Zamorak")) {
                    if(godkills >= 0 && godkills < 10) {
                        return "Follower";
                    } else if(godkills >= 10 && godkills < 20) {
                        return "Corrupt";
                    } else if(godkills >= 20 && godkills < 30) {
                        return "Unholy";
                    } else if(godkills >= 30 && godkills < 70) {
                        return "Murderous";
                    } else if(godkills >= 70 && godkills < 150) {
                        return "Psychotic";
                    } else if(godkills >= 150) {
                        return "Damned";
                    }
                } else if(god.equalsIgnoreCase("Saradomin")) {
                    if(godkills >= 0 && godkills < 10) {
                        return "Follower";
                    } else if(godkills >= 10 && godkills < 20) {
                        return "Blessed";
                    } else if(godkills >= 20 && godkills < 30) {
                        return "Holy";
                    } else if(godkills >= 30 && godkills < 70) {
                        return "Righteous";
                    } else if(godkills >= 70 && godkills < 150) {
                        return "Angelic";
                    } else if(godkills >= 150) {
                        return "Divine";
                    }
                } else if(god.equalsIgnoreCase("Undecided")) {
                    return "Undecided";
                }
                return "Unknown";
   }

search for: public void killedBy(Mob mob, boolean stake) {
inside… under Player player = (Player)mob;…

                        if(player.getGod().equalsIgnoreCase("Zamorak") && getGod().equalsIgnoreCase("Saradomin")) {
                             player.addGodKills(1);
                             world.setFavorPoints(player.getGod(), 1);
                        } else if(player.getGod().equalsIgnoreCase("Saradomin") && getGod().equalsIgnoreCase("Zamorak")) {
                             player.addGodKills(1);
                             world.setFavorPoints(player.getGod(), 1);
                        }

replace incExp void with…

public void incExp(int i, int amount, boolean useFatigue) {
		useFatigue = true;
		if(useFatigue) {
			if(fatigue >= 100) {
				actionSender.sendMessage("@gry@[srvmsg] You are too tired to gain experience, get some rest!");
				return;
			}
			if(fatigue >= 96) {
				actionSender.sendMessage("@gry@[srvmsg] You start to feel tired, maybe you should rest soon.");
			}
			fatigue++;
			actionSender.sendFatigue();
		}
                int totaladd = 0;
		if(isSubscriber()) {
			totaladd += 10;
		}
                if(world.getFavor().equalsIgnoreCase(getGod())) {
                        totaladd += 5;
                }
                amount = amount * (Config.EXP_MULT + totaladd);
		exp[i] += amount;
		if(exp[i] < 0) {
			exp[i] = 0;
		}
		int level = Formulae.experienceToLevel(exp[i]);
		if(level != maxStat[i]) {
			int advanced = level - maxStat[i];
			incCurStat(i, advanced);
			incMaxStat(i, advanced);
			actionSender.sendStat(i);
			actionSender.sendMessage("@gre@You just advanced " + advanced + " " + Formulae.statArray[i] + " level!");
			actionSender.sendSound("advance");
			world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new MiniEvent(this) {
				public void action() {
					owner.getActionSender().sendScreenshot();
				}
			});
			int comb = Formulae.getCombatlevel(maxStat);
			if(comb != getCombatLevel()) {
				setCombatLevel(comb);
			}
		}
	}

org.rscdaemon.ls.model.PlayerSave.java - Part of Kill system / Title System / God System
Near top with other variable declarations…

        private String god;
        private int godkills;

Search for ‘save.setSettings(’ in the file… put the following under it.

                        save.setGod(DataConversions.hashToUsername(result.getLong("god")));
                        save.setGodKills(result.getInt("god_kills"));

Search for ‘public int getY() {’ in the file… and put these functions under it.

        public String getGod() {
            return god;
        }

        public int getGodKills() {
            return godkills;
        }

Search for ‘public void setSettings’ in the file… and put the following after the void

        public void setGod(String s) {
            this.god = s;
        }
        public void setGodKills(int i) {
            this.godkills = i;
        }

Search for: Server.db.updateQuery(“UPDATE rscd_players SET comba after...combatstyle`=” + combatStyle + "
add:

, `god`=" + DataConversions.usernameToHash(god) + ", `god_kills`=" + godkills + "

on the same line…

GO TO PHPMYADMIN
go to rscd database…
goto rscd_players
goto structure…
Add 2 field at end of table…
first field is ‘god’ type: varchar(255) default value ‘75101730521649’ null: no
second field is ‘god_kills’ type: int(255) default value: 0 null: no

org.rscdaemon.server.model.World.java - World Favor
Near top with other variable declarations…

        private int ZamPoints = 0;

        private int SarPoints = 0;

Search: public void setServer
under the void put…

        public String getFavor() {
            if(ZamPoints > SarPoints) {
                return "Zamorak";
            } else if(SarPoints > ZamPoints) {
                return "Saradomin";
            } else {
                return "Neutral";
            }
        }

        public void setFavorPoints(String s, int i) {
            String oldd = getFavor();
            if(s.equalsIgnoreCase("Zamorak")) {
                ZamPoints = ZamPoints + i;
            } else if(s.equalsIgnoreCase("Saradomin")) {
                SarPoints = SarPoints + i;
            }
            String neww = getFavor();
            if(oldd.equalsIgnoreCase("Zamorak") && neww.equalsIgnoreCase("Neutral")) {
                for(Player p : players) {
                    p.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gry@[servmsg] Zamorak no longer has the world's favor, it is now neutral.");
                }
            } else if(oldd.equalsIgnoreCase("Saradomin") && neww.equalsIgnoreCase("Zamorak")) {
               for(Player p : players) {
                    p.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gry@[servmsg] Saradomin no longer has the world's favor.  It now favors Zamorak.");
                }
            } else if(oldd.equalsIgnoreCase("Neutral") && neww.equalsIgnoreCase("Zamorak")) {
                for(Player p : players) {
                    p.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gry@[servmsg] The world is no longer neutral, it now favors Zamorak.");
                }
            } else if(oldd.equalsIgnoreCase("Saradomin") && neww.equalsIgnoreCase("Neutral")) {
                for(Player p : players) {
                    p.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gry@[servmsg] Saradomin no longer has the world's favor, it is now neutral.");
                }
            } else if(oldd.equalsIgnoreCase("Zamorak") && neww.equalsIgnoreCase("Saradomin")) {
                for(Player p : players) {
                    p.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gry@[servmsg] Zamorak no longer has the world's favor.  It now favors Saradomin.");
                }
            } else if(oldd.equalsIgnoreCase("Neutral") && neww.equalsIgnoreCase("Saradomin")) {
                for(Player p : players) {
                    p.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gry@[servmsg] The world is no longer neutral, it now favors Saradomin.");
                }
            }
        }

org.rscdaemon.server.packethandler.client.CommandHandler.java - Say Command / Set Exp Multiplier Runtime
with other commands…

        if(cmd.equals("myrate")) {
                        int totaladd = 0;
                        if(player.isSubscriber()) {
                            totaladd += 10;
                        }
                        if(world.getFavor().equalsIgnoreCase(player.getGod())) {
                            totaladd += 5;
                        }
                        player.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gry@[servmsg] Your personal experience multiplier is " + (Config.EXP_MULT + totaladd) + "x.");
                }
        if(cmd.equals("exprate") && player.isAdmin()) { //syntax ::exprate [value]
                    int id = Integer.parseInt(args[0]);
                    Config.EXP_MULT = id;
                    Player p;
	                for(Iterator i$ = world.getPlayers().iterator(); i$.hasNext();) {
                            p = (Player)i$.next();
                            p.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gry@[servmsg] The experience multiplier has been set to "+ id + "x.");
                        }
                }
        if(cmd.equals("say"))
        {
            int pid = player.getSkillTotal();
            boolean waittime = false;
            if(lasttime == 0L)
            {
                lasttime = System.currentTimeMillis();
            }
            ArrayList informOfChatMessage = new ArrayList();
            Player p;
            for(Iterator i$ = world.getPlayers().iterator(); i$.hasNext(); informOfChatMessage.add(p))
            {
                p = (Player)i$.next();
            }

            String newStr = "@gre@";
            for(int i = 0; i < args.length; i++)
            {
                newStr = (new StringBuilder()).append(newStr).append(args[i]).append(" ").toString();
            }
            if(player.isAdmin())
            {
                newStr = (new StringBuilder()).append("@que@@whi@[@red@Admin@whi@] ").append(player.getUsername()).append(": ").append(newStr).toString();
            } else
            if(player.isMod())
            {
                newStr = (new StringBuilder()).append("@que@@red@[@whi@Mod@red@]@whi@ ").append(player.getUsername()).append(": ").append(newStr).toString();
            } else
            if(player.isPMod())
            {
                newStr = (new StringBuilder()).append("@que@@whi@[@gre@Player Mod@whi@] ").append(player.getUsername()).append(": ").append(newStr).toString();
            } else
            if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lasttime > 20000L || lastplayer != player.getUsername())
            {
                String prefix = "@gry@";
                if(player.getGod().equalsIgnoreCase("Zamorak")) {
                    prefix = "@red@";
                } else if(player.getGod().equalsIgnoreCase("Saradomin")) {
                    prefix = "@cya@";
                }
                newStr = (new StringBuilder()).append("@que@@whi@[").append(prefix).append(player.getTitle()).append("@whi@]").append(player.getUsername()).append(": ").append(newStr).toString();
            } else
            {
                long timeremaining = 10L - (System.currentTimeMillis() - lasttime) / 1000L;
                player.getActionSender().sendMessage((new StringBuilder()).append("@gry@[servmsg] You need to wait ").append(timeremaining).append(" seconds before using ::say again.").toString());
                waittime = true;
            }
            if(!waittime)
            {
                lasttime = System.currentTimeMillis();
                lastplayer = player.getUsername();
                Player pl;
                for(Iterator i$ = informOfChatMessage.iterator(); i$.hasNext(); pl.getActionSender().sendMessage(newStr))
                {
                    pl = (Player)i$.next();
                }

            }
            return;
        }

org.rscdaemon.server.packethandler.PlayerLogin.java -
search: world.registerPlayer(player);
above it add…

                        player.setGod(DataConversions.hashToUsername(p.readLong()));
                        player.setGodKills(p.readShort());

search: sender.sendLoginBox();
below that should be welcome…
below that put…

                        if(world.getFavor().equalsIgnoreCase("Zamorak")) {
                            sender.sendMessage("@red@[servmsg] The world is currently in the favor of Zamorak!");
                            if(player.getGod().equalsIgnoreCase("Zamorak")) {
                                sender.sendMessage("@red@[servmsg] You get an additional 5x added to your experience multiplier.");
                            }
                        } else if(world.getFavor().equalsIgnoreCase("Saradomin")) {
                            sender.sendMessage("@cya@[servmsg] The world is currently in the favor of Saradomin!");
                            if(player.getGod().equalsIgnoreCase("Saradomin")) {
                                sender.sendMessage("@cya@[servmsg] You get an additional 5x added to your experience multiplier.");
                            }
                        } else if(world.getFavor().equalsIgnoreCase("Neutral")) {
                            sender.sendMessage("@gry@[servmsg] The world is currently neutral!");
                        }

org.rscdaemon.ls.packetbuilder.loginserver.PlayerLoginPacketBuilder.java - God Kills/God Loading
Search: int ignoreCount = save.getIgnoreCount();
after for {}
add:

                        packet.addLong(DataConversions.usernameToHash(save.getGod()));
                        packet.addShort(save.getGodKills());

org.rscdaemon.ls.packethandler.loginserver.PlayerSaveHandler.java - God / God Kills Save
search: save.clearBankItems();
after for { } and before saveLastUpdate

                save.setGod(DataConversions.hashToUsername(p.readLong()));
                save.setGodKills(p.readShort());

[size=24pt]This isn’t all, out of characters. Can’t double-post…[/size]
